0: Not long ago I was lower than Lohan
1: No plan, a lost man, raisin' my little girl in a Cadillac Brougham
2: My quest success, but my life was a mess
3: Poor Kenny West, no zest, anti-depressed
6: Than John Mayer waiting on his AIDS test
7: Then I met a man who taught me how to live large
8: Took me out of my car
10: Turns out all I needed was some inspiration
11: Like Mr. Miagi but a lot less Asian
12: My game was timid now my flow much bolder
13: Got a chubby brown angel on my shoulder, sayin'
title: Be-Cleve in Yourself
